'''Beta 1.16.30.56''' is the sixth [[RenderDragon]] beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.200]], released on October 20, 2020,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360050801472|title=Minecraft with RTX Beta - 1.16.30.56 (Windows 10)|date=October 20, 2020}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
* Updated fog settings
* New format for PBR materials - Texture Sets
** These changes will break existing worlds in the RTX Beta. Updating the RTX world templates from the Marketplace will get the latest changes to continue playing
* Added glint effect to held and dropped enchanted items
* Added support for Blindness effect
* Support for solid colored banners
* Added cracking animation when player is above water, but mining blocks underwater
* Improved appearance of sand and ice during day-night cycle

== Fixes ==
'''General'''
* Various performance and stability improvements
* Reduced mouse and keyboard latency
* Fixed several blue squares appearing on some textures ({{bug|MCPE-98780}})
* Fixed a variety of shimmering item issues, including items in hand, in frames, on armor stands, and bobbing on the ground</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* Beta 1.16.30.56 has the same [[protocol version]] as [[Bedrock Edition beta 1.16.100.59|beta 1.16.100.59]], which means these versions are cross-compatible with each other.
